ENGINEERING RESUME POWER TIP FROM FOREMOST RESUMES- Use LinkedIn groups to connect with technical recruiters
Many technical recruiters are active members of LinkedIn groups. If you are a job seeker with a LinkedIn profile, you can join up to 50 LinkedIn groups. Some recruiters run their own groups on LinkedIn. Use the Advanced Search tool to do a search of Groups for the term Technical Recruiter.
#ForemostResumes #EngineeringGreatResumes #Resume
www.ForemostResumes.com Phone: 1-321-442-7994﻿
Meer lezen (10 regels)Minder weergeven · Vertalen

Do my eyes deceive me? #linkedin
I don't know how often I mentioned this here and directed to various social accounts that I had an empty mailbox and a mark on the tab that said one message on +LinkedIn. One tweet to LinkedIn engineering that they shouldn't be wasting their time on Intro, or what ever their Man-in-the-Middle mail client is called, and it was solved ... finally.
It's only been 3 years or so.﻿
Meer weergevenMinder weergeven · Vertalen

Stanford Engineering alums Ankit Gupta and Akshay Kothari developed mobile news aggregation app Pulse as Stanford students and sold recently to LinkedIn for a reported $90 million.
Read more, +1 and share this story: http://stanford.io/1fdD7na
Ankit Gupta and Akshay Kothari recently sold their mobile news aggregation app, Pulse, to LinkedIn. (Chloe Aftel)﻿

DIRECTOR OF ENGINEERING - ABU DHABI
I have a great job opportunity available - fantastic work environment - know anyone who might be a good fit –
NOW ALSO OFFERING FINDER FEES ?
One of our clients is currently looking to hire a Director of Engineering - 5* Property - Abu Dhabi
Anyone with a suitable background who is interested in this role please get in touch :- recruit@hospitalitysearch.co.uk
Feel free to share within your network of contacts and associates
HSI - Hospitality Search International web - www.hospitalitysearch.co.uk Jonathan Bishop LinkedIn: http://uk.linkedin.com/pub/jonathan-bishop/0/52b/4a2 HSI LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/company/3156490?trk=tyah﻿

OK, so linkedin has some suggestions about what groups I might like...
Plan 9 (yeah, now that is an almost psychic suggestion - very impressive) Medical Device Security (OK, that makes sense) Women in Software Engineering (what the ????)﻿

Data Visualization of my LinkedIn Network.Now,I am doing an amazing research about Data Predictive Analysis of my Professional Network..... The color gives you a practical purpose for the visualization, making it easy for me to see which networks need to be expanded upon to better represent my real-life interactions. To sum up, the blue=Construction Network, green=Architecture engineering Network, pink= Real Estate Network, and orange is Finance Network.﻿
